features.name: Reels Feed Bloc
features.description: Manages paginated reel loading, playback state, likes/shares, and integrates with Firebase Auth using BLoC events/states.

features.name: Reel Repository
features.description: Firestore data layer that fetches reels, handles likes/comments/shares, and computes trending reels with engagement scoring.

features.name: Reels Feed Screen
features.description: Full-screen vertical PageView UI that wires the BLoC to ReelsPlayer widgets, restores scroll state, and triggers intelligent prefetching.

features.name: Media Prefetch Service
features.description: Handles reel/story video caching with adaptive bitrate selection, controller pooling, and memory pressure safeguards.

features.name: Backend Cloud Functions
features.description: Node/TypeScript functions located under functions/ supporting feed ranking, notifications, and Firebase integrations.
